import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import "./OrderDetailPrint.scss"; import Table from "./../Table/Table"; OrderDetailPrint.propTypes = { refPrint: PropTypes.object, productList: PropTypes.array, }; OrderDetailPrint.defaultProps = { refPrint: null, productList: [], }; const data = [ { index: 1, price: 1000000, name: "50 bình tân, Bình mỹ, Châu phú, An giang", approve: false, discount: 20, amount: 2, intoMoney: 1000000, }, { index: 2, price: 1000000, name: "50 bình tân, Bình mỹ, Châu phú, An giang", approve: false, discount: 20, amount: 2, intoMoney: 1000000, }, { index: 3, price: 1000000, name: "50 bình tân, Bình mỹ, Châu phú, An giang", approve: false, discount: 20, amount: 2, intoMoney: 1000000, } ]; const header = [ { flex: 1, label: "TT", type: "LABLE", propertyMapping: "index", }, { flex: 4, label: "TÊN SẢN PHẨM", type: "LABLE", }, { flex: 2, label: "GIÁ", propertyMapping: "price", type: "LABLE", }, { flex: 2, label: "GIẢM GIÁ", propertyMapping: "discount", type: "LABLE", }, { flex: 2, label: "SỐ LƯỢNG", propertyMapping: "amount", type: "LABLE", }, { flex: 2, label: "THÀNH TIỀN", propertyMapping: "intoMoney", type: "LABLE", }, ]; function OrderDetailPrint(props) { const { refPrint, productList } = props; const date = new Date(); const day = `0${date.getDate()}`.substr(-2); const month = `0${date.getMonth() + 1}`.substr(-2); const year = date.getFullYear(); return (
{productList.map((item) => { return (

); })} ); } export default OrderDetailPrint;
